title: Fix missing/incorrect logo update across site branding

requirements.text: Ensure the user-provided logo image asset exists in the deployed frontend static assets and is loadable at the path referenced by the UI (`/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png`).

quotes: you did not update the logo
you did not updat my logo

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` exists in the built output and can be fetched directly from the deployed site at `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` (HTTP 200).
The image is a valid PNG and displays correctly in the browser (not broken/missing).

requirements.text: Verify and correct site-wide logo usage so the header and footer branding always render the user-provided logo (and do not fall back to the old generated logo).

quotes: you did not update the logo
you did not updat my logo

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx` uses `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` for the branding image and it visibly renders on the Home, About, Solutions, and Contact pages.

`frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFooter.tsx` uses `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` for the branding image and it visibly renders on the Home, About, Solutions, and Contact pages.
No remaining references to `/assets/generated/linex-logo.dim_512x512.png` are used for the header/footer branding image in the codebase.

requirements.text: Ensure all brand/SEO icon assets referenced in `frontend/index.html` exist and load correctly from the deployed site.

quotes: you did not update the logo
you did not updat my logo

acceptanceCriteria: `/assets/generated/favicon.dim_32x32.png` loads successfully on the deployed site.
`/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png` loads successfully on the deployed site.
`/assets/generated/og-image.dim_1200x630.png` loads successfully on the deployed site.
All user-facing titles/descriptions/alt text related to branding remain in English.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose instead of modifying read-only UI components).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor (no new backend services).
nonGoals: Adding new pages or new product features unrelated to branding/logo.
Changing authentication behavior (Internet Identity) or backend data models.

required: Favicon derived from the user-provided logo (favicon.dim_32x32.png)
Apple touch icon derived from the user-provided logo (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
Social preview image derived from the user-provided logo on a clean background (og-image.dim_1200x630.png)
edits: Replace the existing generated logo with the user-provided logo styling (linex-logo.dim_512x512.png > linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png)
